headline: Project Dirt
text: Observer Ethical awards 2012 Project Dirt logo    Project Dirt is a network of people and organisations running tangible green projects. Members of our network connect to share experiences, seek out resources, ask questions and learn from each other. Project Dirt is a springboard for people and their green projects, and a facilitator for organisations and nice companies. We are less about talk and are more about doing things. Our vision is to make "being green easy and fun". If this sounds like you, please click here to join up today. And if you know of a good Grassroots project, why not encourage them to share what they are doing by creating a project profile.
